statements: DELETE FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location = 'New York' AND water_usage > 100;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE residence_id = 123 AND date = '2022-05-10';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE residence_id = 101 AND water_consumed < 100
DELETE FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5)
DELETE FROM ConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM ConsumptionTrends WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(trend_name) < 5);
DELETE FROM MonthlyTrends WHERE ConsumptionTrend = 'Decreasing' AND Month = '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE Date = '2021-10-01' AND Location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM meter_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
